description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Penrose, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: NSW Southern Highlands Boutique Off-Grid Cabins
hotels.description: The Southern Highlands are calling: get off the grid and discover a new frontier of eco-luxury at this design-led hideaway, set among one of New South Wales’ most spectacular slices of bushland, just 90 minutes from Sydney. With direct access to the Penrose State Forest’s wildflower- and eucalyptus-filled trails, ARUNA Estate promises world-class walkabouts, and a shimmering infinity pool offers the perfect reason to return. Cabins are light-filled and pared-back, featuring an outdoor fire-powered bathtub - your invitation to savour an evening under the stars - or upgrade to the villa for a designer-led stay with more space to breathe and extraordinary views over the valley and the forest beyond.

seo.title: Hoteles en Penrose - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Penrose, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
